content:
I think I'll try to allocate some buffer days and pad my task estimates by 10-20%. I've used Trello before, so I might stick with that for task management. I'm also curious about RescueTime, as I've heard it can help me optimize my productivity.

One more thing - since I have a lot of meetings and calls scheduled, can you suggest some strategies for taking effective notes during those meetings, and then translating those notes into actionable tasks?
